display_long_description:
Become the Pilot of a Giant War Machine in This Immersive VR Mech Shooter

Climb into the battle mech and experience the thrill of large-scale robotic combat like never before. Designed exclusively for VR, this game puts you inside the machine—feel the weight, the power, and the scale of your mech as you move, aim, and fire using intuitive VR controls.

Engage in fast-paced battles against a variety of enemy types:
• Standard combat mechs that challenge you in intense one-on-one duels
• Flying drones that zip through the skies, forcing you to stay alert
• Heavily armed turrets guarding key positions

Use your environment wisely—dodge behind cover to avoid incoming fire, peek out to return shots, and adapt your tactics as enemies swarm from all directions. Every fight feels up close and personal when you’re inside the cockpit.

As you defeat enemies, collect scattered nuts and bolts to upgrade your mech in real-time. Grow in size and strength, unlocking new weapons and abilities as you dominate the battlefield.

Whether you're a fan of mechs, VR action, or simply want to feel like a giant stomping across a war-torn city, this game delivers a powerful sense of scale and immersion that only VR can provide.
